Unnamed Package

  • Class
    Description
    Account
    Abstract base class representing a general-purpose bank account entity.
    AccountFileManager
    Utility class that manages persistence of Account objects.
    BankException
    Base class for all custom banking-related exceptions.
    BankService
    Provides high-level banking operations on existing account data.
    CreditAccount
    Represents a credit account that allows negative balances (debt) and applies a monthly penalty interest if the balance is below zero.
    Customer
    Represents a bank customer with personal and contact details.
    CustomerFileManager
    Utility class for saving and loading Customer objects from a text file.
    DashboardUI
    High-level JavaFX UI builder for the main dashboard of SMT Banking.
    DebitAccount
    Represents a standard debit account belonging to a Customer.
    ExchangeRate
    Utility class for converting monetary values between currencies.
    ForgotPasswordUI
    JavaFX UI for the "Forgot/Reset Password" flow.
    IdGenerator
    Utility class responsible for generating unique IDs for entities such as customers or accounts.
    InsufficientFundsException
    Thrown when an account does not have enough balance to complete a withdrawal or debit-to-credit repayment operation.
    InvalidAmountException
    Thrown when a financial operation receives an invalid amount such as negative, zero, or mathematically impossible values.
    InvalidCnpException
    Thrown when a provided CNP (national identification number) does not match the required format (length, digits, etc.) or already exists in the system.
    LoginUI
    JavaFX UI class for the login screen of the SMT Banking application.
    Main
     
    SavingsAccount
    Represents a savings account that earns monthly interest.
    SignUpUI
    JavaFX UI class for creating new user and customer accounts.
    Transaction
    Represents a financial transaction performed on a bank account.
    TransactionFileManager
    Utility class for saving and loading Transaction history.
    User
    Represents a registered system user in the e-banking application.
    UserFileManager
    Utility class for saving and loading User objects from a text file.
